item.title: 56a Chesterfield Grove-Flytipping 3rd Complaint, 15th February
item.description:
3rd complaint: Flytipping has yet again occurred from here. Health and safety hazard where the box can be blown down injuring pedestrians and also blocking the pavement. Multiple complaints of this conduct submitted but the flytipping keeps occurring, thus now reporting the number of times the complaints have been filed, highlighting the complete disregard of not adhering to law regarding fly tipping.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 25, Chesterfield Grove, East Dulwich, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked drain, 15th February
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Poverest Road, Poverest, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
